title: California National Historic Trail: Original Route BEGIN
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Partners     How To Create Your Sign Plan     The NHT Family of Signs and How to Use Them     Original Route BEGIN                  Original Route BEGIN Sign          As discussed for the Original Route NEXT XX MILES sign, this original route sign is used to identify the beginning point of a segment of road to be signed as an original route. See the description of Original Route NEXT XX MILES for consideration of use.
